text: Shaam () originally refers to a region which includes the modern countries of Syria and Lebanon. It may also refer to: * Shaam Dhaley, a Pakistani drama serial == People == * Mahmood Shaam, a news analyst, journalist and writer from Pakistan * Shaam, an actor and model from India == Places == * Bilad al- Sham, an Islamic province in the Syrian region * Harrat al-Shamah, a volcanic field in the Middle East == See also == * Sham (disambiguation) * Syria (disambiguation)
title: Shaam (disambiguation)
